TopicTitle: A-Tech SPT + A-Tech C1 : 6 Kerbal Duna Colonization Mission Success!

Articles.Content:
The A-Tech team greatly enjoyed ripping apart other phenomenal rockets and assembling spare parts into a Push-Tug capable of bringing the A-Tech C1 to Duna. The C1 has been slightly modified, to re-include the proper ladder grips on the Mosquitos, that seem to have been misplaced and forgotten in the hub-bub of getting the first C1 launch off the ground. After slapping the spare parts together, adding excess fuel modifications, and duct-taping the A-Tech SPT to a Super-Nova lifter, an A-Tech team of 6 set out to colonize Duna. This is their adventure:

A-Tech SPT Take-Off

SPT on approach to A-Tech C1 Craft

Final Docking Approach to C1

Docked With C1. Kerbals Exchanged from SPT (3) to C1 Hitchhiker attachment via EVA during this stage.

Duna landing burn

Little Green Men Celebrate the successful expansion of the A-Tech C1 to Duna via the A-Tech SPT Tug.

The Updated A-Tech C1 - http://www./?83aj0ekzjvj6ca2

The New A - Tech SPT - http://www./?gvb2drpd72prz42

The Mechjeb in the pictures is my Mechjeb version. Craft files do not contain anything but stock parts.

A - Tech C1 : 698 Parts @ launch (will eventually update to Super-Nova lifter, less parts)

A - Tech SPT : 488 Parts @ launch

Please enjoy, and feel free to comment on any improvements we may make.

The Original Allister Technology Colonization Thread: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/showthread.php/27806-Allister-Technology-Colonization-Project

Edited May 16, 2013 by Allister
